name: tutor-testprep
title: Cloud OLTP -> OLAP Orchestration
summary: View the pipeline architecture and live analytical insights for data emitted daily by a operations simulator for a test prep company. An end-to-end AWS pipeline ingests raw rows, then cleanses it into facts and SCD2 dimensions ready for gold layer consumption.
stack: S3 | Athena | Lambda | EventBridge | Google Cloud

name: legacy
title: Legacy Projects
summary: 7 research projects mostly related to machine learning, mostly presented in R or Python notebooks. Topics include natural language processing, time series, market basket, and predictive analytics. Data contexts include healthcare, real estate, retail, tech, and government.
stack: Tensorflow ML | Keras Deep Learning | Tableau | SAS
